name: Don't open this door too!!
description:
The Creators of don't open the door presents: 

Don't open this door too! The gameplay is completely different from the last game, and you'll find this gameplay more interesting. 

An entirely new system with amazing interactions of a new environment of not opening a door and this game has bring a new light of entertaining things to do to make you not open the door at all!

Complete 10 task and take a vacation in the city!  How long will you keep this job at a graveyard shift?  It has gotten worse, I told you not to open that last door. and now this world is becoming more corrupted!! What are you expecting us to do and if you are new here. please leave, don't download, you hear something that you don't suppose to.
